sentences.en: Hormones regulate many insect functions, including ecdysis and metamorphosis.
sentences.cn: 激素调节昆虫的许多功能，包括蜕皮和变态。

sentences.en: Hormones regulate many insect functions, including ecdysis and metamorphosis. Pheromones are chemicals emitted by one individual that alter the behavior of another member of the same species.
sentences.cn: 激素调节昆虫的许多功能，包括蜕皮和变态。性信息素是由一种个体释放出来以改变同种其它成员行为的化合物。

sentences.en: The 2nd ecdysis larvae appeared eyestalk, the 4th pereiopod was recognized as a faint swelling and the1st, 2nd pereiopod had 6,6 pairs of natatory setae on the exopod respectively.
sentences.cn: 第2次蜕皮后的叶状幼体开始出现眼柄及第4步足呈乳头状突起，第1、第2步足外肢具有6对羽状刚毛；

sentences.en: The process of toads ecdysis was reported, and the significance of environmental protection and the commercialization of bufonic was discussed.
sentences.cn: 报道了中华大蟾蜍自然蜕皮（蟾蜍衣）的过程，并讨论了蟾蜍衣商品化的经济意义和环保意义。

words.tran_cn: 换羽毛；（蛇等的）[动][昆]蜕皮

trans.tran_en: the periodic shedding of the cuticle in insects and other arthropods or the outer epidermal layer in reptiles
